articles.description: Merseyside Police say they're responding to reports of a car colliding with pedestrians on Water Street. It is not yet clear if anyone is injured.
articles.title: Male detained after road traffic collision at Liverpool FC parade, police say

articles.description: Matheus Cunha's transfer to Manchester United is at an advanced stage as the Wolves forward nears a £62.5m move to Old Trafford.
articles.title: Matheus Cunha: Manchester United close to signing Wolves striker

articles.description: Xabi Alonso declares the start of a new era as he is unveiled as the new manager of Real Madrid.
articles.title: Xabi Alonso announces 'start of new era' at Real Madrid

articles.description: England withstand all-rounder Hayley Matthews' brilliance to win the third and final T20 by 17 runs and complete a dominant series clean sweep in Charlotte Edwards and Nat Sciver-Brunt's first series in charge.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Hosts secure T20 series clean sweep despite Hayley Matthews' brilliance

articles.description: Britain's Katie Boulter lands her first French Open win at the age of 28 after Jacob Fearnley beats former champion Stan Wawrinka.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Katie Boulter wins at Roland Garros after Jacob Fearnley beats Stan Wawrinka

articles.description: BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty reviews the Premier League season - and looks back to his August predictions.
articles.title: Phil McNulty's Premier League end of season review

articles.description: Emma Raducanu battles through illness to win on her French Open return and set up a second-round meeting with defending champion Iga Swiatek.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Emma Raducanu beats Wang Xinyu and will face Iga Swiatek in second round

articles.description: Leading Formula 1 drivers give mixed reviews to the new Monaco Grand Prix rule that forced drivers to use three sets of tyres in the race.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Lando Norris and Lando Norris among drivers to give two-stop rule mixed reviews

articles.description: Iga Swiatek and Paula Badosa both say they were inspired by the great Rafael Nadal in their first-round French Open victories.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Iga Swiatek and Paula Badosa inspired by Rafael Nadal in first-round wins at Roland Garros

articles.description: Former Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag signs a two-year contract to succeed Xabi Alonso as Bayer Leverkusen head coach.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Bayer Leverkusen confirm ex-Manchester United boss as new head coach
